descriptionHtml:
[font=Courier New][size=4]Hey!

[/size][size=3]This is a compilation of screenshots I took while internet depraved :\ so rather than them just sitting on my hard drive I thought this would be a better use of them rather than a "Wasted effort!". you may use these shots forYour own "[color=#cc0000][b]PERSONAL USE[/b][/color]"e.g. Desktop wallpaper.


[/size][size=4]Questions:[/size]
[color=#0066ff][size=3]Why tf did you make this?

[/size][/color][color=#ff0000][size=3]Why tf not?!
[/size][/color][color=#0066cc][size=3]
How do I unzip the files?

[/size][/color][color=#ff0000][size=3]How tf are you still alive?!.....no but seriously download winrar or
alternate unzipping tool and just click on the file and extract.

[/size][/color][color=#0066ff][size=3]Why the NSFW folder?

[/size][/color][color=#ff0000][size=3]…...*Cough*ah *Cough* the nexus won't allow me to directly share these shots via
the image share area. :')

[/size][/color][color=#ff0000][size=5][u][b]Permissions

[/b][/u][/size][/color][size=3]Not under any circumstances are you to upload any of my shots to the
nexus nor anywhere else.

I,ll say it again you are Not to use any of my screenshots as your own, if[/size]
[size=3]I see or anyone notifies me of any “Theft” the image and your[/size]
[size=3]account will be immediately reported.  [/size]

[size=4](This file contains over 90 shots!)[/size][/font]
author: Michaelspicer16
